goal.ch: 本課程旨在培養學生獨立思考和解決問題的能力，使其能運用試算表和代數語言為管理決策問題塑模並求解。
goal.en: This course is to enable students to employ spreadsheet and algebric modeling for managerial decision problems in order to establish their critical thinking and problem-solving capability.

outline.ch: 本課程將介紹多種管理決策模型和試算表建模方法。目的在學習如何：(1) 建模：建立決策問題的試算表模型，及其對應的代數模型；(2) 求解：使用最佳化工具軟體─規劃求解找出問題的解答；(3)解釋和分析：解釋結果報表和敏感度報表並執行若則分析；(4)建議和實施：建議可行方案並協助實施決策。我們將使用微軟的Excel來示範本課程中的管理決策模型。案例研討的重要主題包括固定成本、供應鏈管理、和投資組合最佳化等。
outline.en: “This course is to introduce various managerial decision models and spreadsheet modeling. The objective is to learn how to:(1) Modeling: formulate a spreadsheet model and its corresponding mathematical model; (2) Solving: use software optimization tool-Solver to solve the problem; (3) interpreting and analyzing: interpret the outcome and sensitivity reports and conduct what-if analysis; (4) recommending and implementing: recommend alternative solutions and help implement the decision.We will be using MS Excel to demo various managerial decision models in this course. Case studies are used to demonstrate important topics such as fixed cost, supply chain management, and investment portfolio, and to establish the hands-on capability to solve practical decision problems. Students can choose to develop real case to earn extra credit.“
